about_the_game:
Story

A quantum burst from a rift in the S-Dimension has swept through Guanlan Lake Area.

The most ordinary creatures have evolved into Feykind.

They gained abilities far surpassing humans: their energy is more powerful; their adaptability perfect; their vitality robust.

However, they retained their animal instinct...

Guanlan Lake has been turned into Forest, and the students have lost their Garden.

Yet, the ambition of the Feykind goes beyond this. The University is destined for destruction, and humanity within the galaxy will be eradicated.

Extinction Probability: 170141183460469231731687303715.884105727%

Survival Rate: 0.00000000000000000002305843009213693951%

Nevertheless, the aftermath of the quantum burst also allowed the only human to evolve...

Liu Yuxin, a student dozing off during her Management 101 class has been transformed into a Magical Girl!

She is now bearing the responsibility of saving the University and humanity!

For the hope of humanity, the decisive battle unfolds in the vast sky...

Gameplay

An STG featuring magical girls and an instant-upgrade system

Collect energy while fighting Feykind

Make quick decisions, spend energy to purchase equipment and upgrades

You can't refund upgrades no matter what they are

*Game Features*

- Diverse Bullet Patterns -

- Fast-paced bullet hell shooting gameplay -

- The thrill of grazing and dodging bullets -

- 5 challenging stages -

- 3 difficulties -

- Special scoring system -

- Decision-making element with the instant-upgrade upgrade system -

The most ordinary creatures have evolved into Feykind.

However, they retained their animal instinct...

name: GuanLan Magic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsXP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 1.6GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1.5 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7,8,8.1,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E5300 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

short_description: For the hope of humanity, the decisive battle unfolds in the vast sky...An STG featuring magical girls and an instant-upgrade system！Let's save Guanlan!
